snippet: Atlantic Media’s owner announced that the head of the company’s live event business, Elizabeth Baker Keffer, would be joining BDT & Company, the merchant banking firm run by Byron D. Trott.
abstract: Atlantic Media’s owner announced that the head of the company’s live event business, Elizabeth Baker Keffer, would be joining BDT & Company, the merchant banking firm run by Byron D. Trott.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Atlantic Media Executive Heads to Byron Trott's Firm
